item.title: Using Ansible to Interact with the Satellite API
item.description: Red Hat Satellite is an essential tool in large scale enterprise environments that can be used to manage repository content, as well as provision, manage, and scan deployed systems. Managing connected hosts is an essential task when maintaining any deployed instance of Red Hat Satellite, and one of the easiest tools to accomplish this on a mass scale is using Ansible. Red Hat provides the certified redhat.satellite Ansible collection that can accomodate most workflows, of which its upstream is the theforeman.
